name: lightingMode_setValue
description: This function is used to change the lighting mode of a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the lighting mode.

parameters.name: predefinedLightingMode
parameters.description: The specific lighting mode to be set (e.g., writing mode, night mode, sleep mode).

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The mode to be set (used interchangeably with predefinedLightingMode).
